verbose_text: In future work it would be interesting to explore whether there is an interplay between class II and class III PI3Ks and whether inhibition of Vps34 results in the activation of a class II PI3K driven compensatory mechanism to produce PtdIns (3) P. Moreover, we observed a marked reduction in SGK3 activity and phosphorylation within 15 s treatment with VPS34-IN1 which was nearly maximal by 30 s.
